title: So wake me up...
body:
...when Jhinstalock ends....

He hasn't even been out for a day and I've seen 15 instalocking Jhins that miss the call but proudly proclaim they can support (I got to play a single one of those games, and we lost. Someone skipped every other time, presumably because they wanted Jhin.) Nobody is taking the time to learn the champion, everybody is going apeshit, and I've seen ranked games skipped because Jhin was either banned to save the teams from some dumbass, or because he got picked on the first day.

Really.

replies.body: Welcome to every champion release ever, broski. I won't get to play mid for a week.
